TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: I understand how the time loop works now and I remember everything from previous cycle.
SOLANUM: Daz said: «Sending memories back in time and going back in time physically are two different actions».

SOLANUM: I can imagine such technology would be worthy of celebration at the Nomai festival. Now we can try to get to <color=orange>the Vessel</color>. I'll open the core once again, but next loop it's your turn.
